alert.note: Alert for Gila; Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 5:10PM MST until August 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 600 PM MST. * At 509 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Apache Lake, or 12 miles southwest of Roosevelt, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fountain Hills, Ballantine Trailhead, Sugarloaf Mountain, Saguaro Lake, Canyon Lake, Goldfield Ranch, Four Peaks, Apache Lake, Salt River Tubing Recreation Area, Rio Verde, Fort McDowell, and Tortilla Flat. This includes AZ Route 87 between mile markers 191 and 210. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
